name: Rescue Operation
description:
Rescue Operation

is a first-person shooter game. The game will follow the scenario of the game, and destroy the enemies in its path.
Agent "Odyssey" reported that the enemy base is conducting terrible experiments on prisoners. It's time to get our agent out of this hell. The Alpha group brings out the agent, the Omega will get all the information about the results of the research.

Key features of the game:
- There is an interesting plot;
- Pleasant soundtrack;
- Addictive gameplay.
